author: jsisson
msg: GERONIMO-1166 (part 2) Provide Tomcat like startup and shutdown scripts (see mail thread http://www.mail-archive.com/dev@geronimo.apache.org/msg12524.html ).  The new scripts also allow Geronimo to be launched in the background.
You can either use the geronimo.sh/bat script (most friendly for new users) or can call the startup.sh/bat or shutdown.sh/bat scripts directly (just like Tomcat).

msg: Add modified ant.bat in faqs. This version send correctly exit code to continuum
